pages.title: Resonance Extractor
pages.text: The <item>Resonance Extractor/$ is the main way of producing <thing>$(l:intro/beam)beams/$. It consumes items as fuel.$(br2)It consumes one item every cycle (5 ticks or quarter second), producing a <thing>$(l:intro/beam)beam/$ out the front. Different items produce different <thing>$(l:intro/beam)beams/$- with different amounts of <thing>energy/$, <thing>potential/$,
